sentence: A big part of this play is that Kinzinger, along with neo-conservatives like Rep. Liz Cheney, are battling to regain control over a political party now inundated with more flagrantly corrupt, more flagrantly authoritarian, and more flagrantly incompetent officials like Sen. Josh Hawley and Reps. Madison Cawthorn, Lauren Boebert, and Paul Gosar ascending to prominence.
title: Adam Kinzinger has a lot to say: Donald Trump is the worst president the U.S. ever had'

sentence: More:GOP censures Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger, calls Jan. 6 riot 'legitimate political discourse' With the Senate deadlocked 50-50 between the parties and controlled by the Democrats because of Vice President Kamala Harris' tie-breaking vote the Republicans face toss-up Senate elections in places like Pennsylvania, Georgia and Arizona, states that Biden carried.
author: David Jackson
title: Mitch McConnell calls Jan. 6 a 'violent insurrection,' hits Republicans for censure of Cheney, Kinzinger

title: Opinion The problem with the GOP isn't just the demagogues. It's the voters.

title: Opinion The problem with the GOP isn't just the demagogues. It's the voters.

sentence: They believe Biden is a return to normalcy and that the next presidential contest will include a mannerly Republican they can abide because the party platform will go back to being bait only used to deceptively snare enough votes without any intention of it guiding action (echoes of McCain and Romney with a side of Liz Cheney.)
author: Matt Schlapp
title: JD Vance's victory proves the old GOP has been transformed
